content:
I've been wondering if the chapter at https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/edition-guide/editions/transitioning-an-existing-project-to-a-new-edition.html should be updated to use examples from 2021 instead of 2018. What do people think?

https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/edition-guide/editions/creating-a-new-project.html will definitely need updating.
